bio:
Hi! I’m Ben Borgers. 

I’m a high school senior in Boston, MA. I make things with JavaScript, Node.js, React, React Native, and Laravel.

I’m on [twitter](https://twitter.com/benborgers) and [github](https://github.com/benborgers). If you wanna get in touch, I love getting emails: [benborgers@hey.com](mailto:benborgers@hey.com)

bullets.text: Building [Bagel Institute](https://bagel.institute), tools for more interactive college teaching
